title: Hardest spell to use in the game.
body:
What is the hardest spell to use for you?
I'll go ahead and say {{champion:101}} R. one of the few spells that require me to use braincells atm ;p

replies.body: Kalistas r because it requires your teammate to be near and want to make the same play as you

{{champion:68}}'s Ultimate

Since I forget to disable quick-cast, I screw up my first ultimate whenever playing him.

Then,  I screw up my first ultimate on other champions because I forge to enable quick-cast.
practice using viktors e, it casts the same way
i'll never understand why ppl say it's so hard to use rumb ulti. i do it on smartcast consistently even tho i never play rumble .. hmm same with victor E.
Varius R is the hardest skillshot in the game. Or Syndra R for those dank outplays.

Xerath R just feels weird tbh.

But there reall aren't hard to use skills, just combos that are hard.
